cause.description:
Fight for Jessica is an organization based out of Los Angeles that raises money and awareness for an 11-year-old girl named Jessica Leoni. Jessica is one of only 300 kids in the world that has been afflicted with a fatal neurological disease called Niemann Pick-Type C. Just a few short years ago, Jessica went to school and joyfully danced at her local studio like a regular child. Now, after almost 4 years of aggresive seizures, Jessica can no longer talk or walk. She lost her ability to swallow and now has a feeding tube. Gradually she is losing the mobility of her muscles and joints. As of now, there is no cure. However, Jessica's beautiful smile is a reminder of her courageous spirit. She is hopeful and continues to fight to stay alive. Please join me in the fight for Jessica! For more information visit www.fightforjessica.com.
If you would like to send Jessica a message of encouragement, you can visit http://www.caringbridge.org/visit/jessicaleoni and write on her guestbook!
1. Persevere
2. We need to find a cure to end her suffering
